remarks: Deduction form of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ hb3an . (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2013.)
statement:
hb3and.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
hb3and.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
hb3and.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( th -> A. x th ) ) $.
hb3and $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ps /\ ch /\ th ) -> A. x ( ps /\ ch /\ th ) ) ) $.
